headline: United Airlines’ best loyalty perks will soon be reserved for its cardholders. Is the card worth it?
summary: Frequent flyers who hold a United Airlines co-branded credit or debit card can soon earn up to twice as many miles as noncardholders, effectively rewarding the airline’s biggest spenders.

raw.headline: United Airlines’ best loyalty perks will soon be reserved for its cardholders. Is the card worth it?
raw.summary: Frequent flyers who hold a United Airlines co-branded credit or debit card can soon earn up to twice as many miles as noncardholders, effectively rewarding the airline’s biggest spenders.

headline: What's Going On With United Airlines Stock Friday?
summary: United Airlines (NASDAQ: UAL) shares rise after previous session's decline due to fuel cost concerns. Longer-term strength, analyst optimism.

raw.headline: What's Going On With United Airlines Stock Friday?
raw.summary: United Airlines (NASDAQ: UAL) shares rise after previous session's decline due to fuel cost concerns. Longer-term strength, analyst optimism.

headline: Airlines have devalued their loyalty programs over time, says The Points Guy’s Clint Henderson
summary: Clint Henderson, The Points Guy travel expert, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss United Airline's overhaul of its MileagePlus loyalty program, future of travel loyalty programs, and more.
